metadata.title: CVE-2019-9232 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In libvpx, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing boundscheck. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additionalexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-122675483

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx5 - 1.7.0-3ubuntu0.18.04.1
vpx-tools - 1.7.0-3ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvpx package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.0-3ubuntu0.18.04.1').
